ModMetaData.name: Engraved Walls [b18]
ModMetaData.author: Karthas077
ModMetaData.description:
(Last update: 07/02/2018)
Smooth and engrave walls just like in Dwarf Fortress!
=====
Compatibility:
"Engraved Walls" is compatible with mods that add new natural stones (As long as they follow Vanilla naming conventions), as well as many embrasure adding mods. =====
Credits:
A vast majority of the work on this mod comes from Rainbeau Flambe (dburgdorf)'s "Smooth Stone Walls" mod.
The mod utilizes Pardeike's "Harmony Patch Library." (No additional download is required, as the library is included with the mod.)
=====
License:
Use however you want as long as you don't try to claim this work as your own.
=====
